app.name: Avnet IoTConnect Optiga Example
app.description:
Code example for boards with Optiga Secure Element to connect to Avnet IoTConnect Platform.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.

License Disclaimer:

This code example makes use of the lwIP open-source TCP/IP stack. Creating a project from this template will cause lwIP to be downloaded on your computer. It is your responsibility to understand and accept the lwIP license.

Creating a project from this template will cause Mbed TLS to be downloaded on your computer. It is your responsibility to understand and accept the Mbed TLS license and regional use restrictions (including abiding by all applicable export control laws).

app.name: Avnet IoTConnect Basic Example
app.description:
Basic example for connecting to Avnet IoTConnect Platform.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.

License Disclaimer:

This code example makes use of the lwIP open-source TCP/IP stack. Creating a project from this template will cause lwIP to be downloaded on your computer. It is your responsibility to understand and accept the lwIP license.

Creating a project from this template will cause Mbed TLS to be downloaded on your computer. It is your responsibility to understand and accept the Mbed TLS license and regional use restrictions (including abiding by all applicable export control laws).

app.name: Avnet IoTConnect AI IMU Example
app.description:
This code example demonstrates how to use Avnet IoTConnect to send data to the cloud from an Imagimob generated machine learning model. It comes pre-configured with a model generated from the Human Activity Detection starter project in Imagimob Studio. The code example collects accelerometer data from an IMU which is then sent to the machine learning model to detect specific motions (sitting, standing, walking, running, or jumping). It uses the model.c/h files generated from within Imagimob Studio directly. New models based on the Human Activity Detection project can be dropped into the project as-is.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.

app.name: Avnet IoTConnect AI Baby Monitor Example
app.description:
This code example demonstrates how to use Avnet IoTConnect to send data to the cloud from an Imagimob generated machine learning model with the ModusToolbox™ Machine Learning (MTBML) flow. The code example includes two models that (IMU and PDM) are generated from Imagimob Studio's starter projects. The sample application supports only the PDM AI model, but it can be integrated with the IMU model.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.

app.name: Avnet IoTConnect Imagimob Ready Ready Model
app.description:
This code example demonstrates how to use Avnet IoTConnect to send Machine Learning data to the cloud using an Imagimob Studio Ready Model library on ModusToolbox™ Machine Learning (MTBML) flow. The code example includes six different models where five model detect differet sounds such as baby-cry detection, cough detection, alarm detection, siren detection, and snoring detection which uses data from the pulse-density modulation (PDM) to pulse-code modulation (PCM) which is sent to the model for detection. The sixth model detects hand gestures which uses data from the radar sensor.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.
